sentences.english: The evolution las of alkali rich porphyry is correlated with those of other 4 magmatic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 對富鹼斑岩和其它4類岩漿岩進行了演化規律的對比。

sentences.chinese: 斜長石廣泛出現在各類岩漿岩中。

sentences.english: The pre-Tetiary basement of the Pearl River Mouth Basin mainly consists of Yanshan magamatite.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口盆地前第三紀基底主要是燕山期岩漿岩。

sentences.english: Two types of enclaves occur in the magmatic plutons in Tongling area, Anhui.
sentences.chinese: 銅陵地區岩漿岩中產有兩類岩石包體。
